data.sentence: The word فَلَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:
The word النُّجُومِ comes from the root ن ج م and is associated with the meanings: to appear/rise/begin, accomplish, ensue, proceed.

data.meanings: to divide, dispose, separate, apportion, distribute. qasamun - oath. qismatun - partition, division, dividing, apportionment. maqsumun - divided/distinct. muqassimun (vb. 2) - one who takes oath, who apportions. qasama (vb. 3) - to swear. aqsama (vb. 4) - to swear. taqasama (vb. 6) - to swear one to another. muqtasimun (vb. 8) - who divides. istaqsama (vb. 10) - to draw lots. tastaqsimu - you seek division.
data.sentence: The word أُقْسِمُ comes from the root ق س م and is associated with the meanings: to divide, dispose, separate, apportion, distribute. qasamun - oath. qismatun - partition, division, dividing, apportionment. maqsumun - divided/distinct. muqassimun (vb. 2) - one who takes oath, who apportions. qasama (vb. 3) - to swear. aqsama (vb. 4) - to swear. taqasama (vb. 6) - to swear one to another. muqtasimun (vb. 8) - who divides. istaqsama (vb. 10) - to draw lots. tastaqsimu - you seek division.

data.meanings: to fall down, befall, come to pass, be conformed, happen, take place, ascertain.
data.sentence: The word بِمَوَاقِعِ comes from the root و ق ع and is associated with the meanings: to fall down, befall, come to pass, be conformed, happen, take place, ascertain.
